entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Walden - Calendar/ToDo/Notes
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Lifetime MembershipÔºö$9.99 ‚Üí $7.99

Application Description

Walden is an App focused on personal management, carefully designed to bring users only a quality experience, hope you like it. Function Introduction To-Do List Integrate the four quadrants of work, according to the priority of the task rational scheduling. Support repeat schedule and reminders. Pomodoro Walden's built-in tomato clock is designed strictly according to the tomato work method You can set daily tomato clock goals, rest time, and select the tasks to focus on from the to-do list Progress Management Quantify your goals, support goal grouping and progress notes, with a simple and beautiful progress bar, clearly track your goal progress. Flash Notes Integrate custom tags, support full-text search and display by tags. In our daily life, there will always be a moment of light and whimsy, it can be the emotion after reading a text, it can be the resonance of listening to a song, or simply want to record the moment's thoughts. If you are like me and want to practice writing long articles, then you can start by writing a paragraph every day and gradually improve your writing skills day by day. ----------------- Subscription Instructions --Subscription period: 1 month, 1 year (non-automatic renewal, please feel free to purchase) -- Payment: Payment will be deducted through the user's iTunes account, and payment will be made once the user confirms the purchase. --User Terms: http://freelancer-x.com/app-terms/ -- Privacy Policy: http://freelancer-x.com/app-privacy-policy/

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: AirDisk Pro
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí Free Ôºâ

Application Description

Introducing AirDisk Pro, the ultimate solution for storing, managing, and accessing files on your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch. With seamless connectivity to any Mac or PC over Wi-Fi, you can effortlessly transfer files by simply dragging and dropping them from the Finder or Windows Explorer. AirDisk Pro boasts a wide range of features, including a powerful document viewer, PDF reader, music player, image viewer, voice recorder, text editor, file manager, and support for various file operations such as delete, move, copy, email, share, zip, unzip, and more. Key Features: 1. Cloud Storage Support: Enjoy the convenience of multiple links to your iCloud Drive, Google Drive, Dropbox, and OneDrive storage accounts. 2. Document Reader: Effortlessly access and view files in MS Office, iWork, Text, and HTML formats. 3. Multimedia Player: Create your own audio playlists with repeat, shuffle, background playback, and remote control functionality from multitask. 4. HTTP/FTP Password Protection: Ensure secure file transfers between your PC/Mac with password protection. 5. File Operations: Efficiently manage your files with options to move, copy, rename, delete, zip, unzip, unRAR, create files, and folders. 6. File Sharing: Easily share files with other iPhone/iPad devices via Bluetooth or Wi-Fi, with automatic search for nearby available devices. 7. Easy File Upload: Conveniently upload files through your PC/Mac web browser or via USB using iTunes File Sharing. 8. Import/Files Creation: Create text files, capture images, record videos, make voice recordings, and import pictures from your photo library. 9. Passcode Lock: Protect your files from unauthorized access by setting a passcode, or conveniently use TouchID support for added security. 10. Universality: Enjoy the seamless experience across both iPhone and iPad with a single purchase. Audio Player Features: ‚Ä¢ Create in-app audio playlists ‚Ä¢ Play all MP3 files from a folder as a playlist ‚Ä¢ Repeat and shuffle songs ‚Ä¢ Support for background audio playback ‚Ä¢ Control audio playback from multitask with Audio Remote Control Viewable Formats: ‚Ä¢ Audio: WAV, MP3, M4A, CAF, AIF, AIFF, AAC ‚Ä¢ Images: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP, TIF, TIFF, ICO ‚Ä¢ Movies: MP4, MOV, MPV, M4V ‚Ä¢ iWorks: Pages, Numbers, Keynote ‚Ä¢ Microsoft Office: Word, Excel, PowerPoint ‚Ä¢ RTF (Rich Text Format) ‚Ä¢ RTFD (TextEdit with embedded images) ‚Ä¢ PDF Documents ‚Ä¢ Plain Text ‚Ä¢ Source Code ‚Ä¢ HTML Web Pages ‚Ä¢ Web Archives For more information, please visit our website: http://www.app2pro.com To learn more about our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, please read: ‚Ä¢ Terms of Service: https://app2pro.com/policy/terms-of-service.pdf ‚Ä¢ Privacy Policy: https://app2pro.com/policy/privacy-policy.pdf

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad
